text: Shah Ä°smael Gori Camping ==Battle== Shah Ismail first sent an ultimatum to all Sunni leaders and went on a campaign against the Black Sheep who did not comply, then he organized a series of campaigns against the Sunni Sheibanis and Turkistan and won this campaign. ==References== Category:16th-century battles Category:16th century in Asia Category:History of Uzbekistan
title: Shah Ismail's Turkestan Expedition
